titleStmt.title: A discourse of the gospel of peace and of the government of our own spirits being the substance of divers sermons from Ephes. VI, 15 and Prov. XVI, 32 / lately preached by John Faldo ...

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
